meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7825.

td.p: Dino Alexander, a medical lab scientist from Fayetteville, North Carolina
Rob Salerno, a writer-actor from Los Angeles, California
Kyle Jones, a music teacher from Aurora, Colorado (whose 7-day cash winnings total $145,403)

tr.td: HOT, COLD OR IN BETWEEN
TERMS IN HISTORY
HELP ME WITH THE TITLE
CHRIS P.
OUTSIDE
TENDER INSIDE

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Rob] I can\'t make it out.)
(Rob: I was trying to say Prussian, but that doesn\'t make sense either.)
(Alex: No. The country was Turkey, and the gem and the color was [*].)
DinoWhat is topaz?
$3,001
KyleWhat is Azure?
$5,000
RobWhat is sapphire pruss?
$2,200
turquoise')
